title: Arcade Sona's Auras

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: The pixels are not on the auras' borders, but inside the auras.

replies.body:
This also happens with Dj sonas Concussive q,w,e auras. 
here are her auras before the range change: (you need to scroll down a bit to see her auras)(but thanks surr@20)  http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/02/dj-sona-now-available.html
and here is my twitter post with her live auras of concussive : https://twitter.com/ricklessabandon/status/757724082645245952?lang=el 
sorry i dont have flickr of something else to upload photos here :(
sorry it took a while to get to this, but i should have a fix in for 6.16

congrats on destroying akali. i bet you feel proud, cause now she cant have consistent hits during laning phase with minions (Hard hit, Medium hit, garbage hit), cant W on creeps so akali takes hella poke to get creeps, Her R is garbage still. congrats man :)
Can I get you to take a look at [this one](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Hgjb6QlX-game-morg-and-new-altclick-functionality) please?
Thanks for the report! Looks like this may have occurred due to some of the Sona changes. Lemme dig into it. :)
